description.english: Completed all four tests with Jan.
Find the first Mon in Shamazaar.
Find and speak to Shamaz Zeb.
Find and stop Naarn. He may know about the Mon.

displayName.english: I bet he'll get high on this!

description.english: Bring magwa to help Shamaz Mazum.

displayName.english: Is he a dealer or what?

description.english: Find Logar who may know where to get magwa.
Bring the stone tablet for Shamaz Mazum.
Find a Shamaz to heal Ilott.

displayName.english: So the Riss counters know, huh?

description.english: Talk to riss counters to know more about Essence Idols.
Use dynamite on chest.
Deliver twon-ha to Zolass.
Kill the gamors that are far east of the village.
Find the Essence Stone for Zeo.

displayName.english: I think I kinda understood that.

description.english: Find the Essence Stone to stop riss production.
Remove more soldiers from Shamazaar for Maar.

displayName.english: So you're the engineers here, aren't you?

description.english: Talk to recreators.
Convince region leaders to stop producing supplies.
Find sticks marking off secret stashes of goods in the mud around Shamazaar.
Find the Shamaz in Okaar.
Obtained a map that seems to show locations in this region.
Ask Kyuran to decrypt the map.
Find and fight the Achondar.
Give the message from Oru to Kyuran.

displayName.english: I hope it'll be some disco tune!

description.english: Zave thinks the marks are music notes.
Locate Shamaz Kalab in Okasankaar.
Find Oru's gun in a sunken temple to the southwest of Cyana.
Locate two buttons on land near the sunken temple, ask some talan near there to help push them.
Speak with Shamaz Kaleb to get Oru's gun.

displayName.english: Ah come on, why am I the only one working here?

description.english: Sadar needs a zeedog gland to fix his boat.
Need large piece of helidium from Motazaar to fix boat light for Zernar.

displayName.english: That's not a problem, my friend. That's a solution for my blood lust!

description.english: Zernar says there are too many soldiers around for his liking.

displayName.english: Whatever you need, my friend. As long as I get the ammo!

description.english: To make the 5 special bullets, Oru needs 5 daguerach and 5 booyat.
Zafar let slip that the booyats grow in the Darosham.
Zafar wants me to watch his stand and stop anyone who takes from it when he is not there.
Tell Zidar his friend at the Darosham is ok.
Free Shamaz Keb who knows about Mon.

displayName.english: Damage? I'm always in when damage is needed!

description.english: Ashkar wants me to damage the rift bridge somehow, he thinks it will slow down the soldiers.

displayName.english: Pure piece of Helidium? I like that!

description.english: Head to the north mine to find a pure piece of helidium.
Go to Okriana with the new piece of helidium and see Azirad.
Ashkar wants more soldiers removed from Motazaar.
Gamors took a machine part with them, follow the trail to the south.
Don't leave Zoran until he's fixed the bridge and protect him from any soldiers.
Don't leave Makee until he's fixed the bridge and protect him from any soldiers.
Don't forget to find the high soldiers and get their key, they should be at the camp next to the rift entrance.
Zine wants me to bring him two faenea to heal his friend.

displayName.english: Why would you want it back? Ah, whatever...

description.english: A water merchant, Mobarr, wants his twon-ha back.

displayName.english: Hey, be careful with that, okay?

description.english: Bring three pieces of dynamite to Zogard.
Go to Okriana and get a lift handle to free Zogard!

displayName.english: Zakk, I need a handle... Fast!

description.english: Maybe Zakk will be able to make a handle. Find him.

displayName.english: Let's free Zogard! For good, this time.

description.english: Take the lift handle to the east mine.
Some Talan is trapped in the east mine.
Go to Okriana.  Marion may be there.
Repair Heza well.
Ominel wants an Oogoobar knife to lower his meat price for Heza.
Balazar wants me to find a relic outside the walls of Okriana.
Now Balazar wants me to clean this relic while fighting an achondar in Okaar.

displayName.english: Okay, I'll tell him, I'll tell him!

description.english: I found Ezef, he wants me to tell Yagu he's still looking for their father.

displayName.english: How am I gonna explain this...

description.english: Ezef was reverted, Yagu's not going to like this.
Jokace thinks four zeedog glands would help him.
Nikaa wants a loan of some zorkins.

displayName.english: Sometimes, I feel like I'm not rewarded enough.

description.english: Mored wants me to bring him 10 hoti from Okaar.

displayName.english: And me? Can I get a reward too?

description.english: Zele wants me to return a reward to Gizo.
Gizo would like me to find the Talan in Okasankaar that this bracelet belongs to.

displayName.english: She just can't get into enough trouble, can she?!

description.english: Marion is in a house to the west of the Palace Fae.
Bring 5 lampe and 1 daguerach to Zagu to make a drugged lampe.
Zakk wants to study the metal on the HK-P12. I should return for it soon.
Azirad had a necklace stolen. He lost the thief somewhere in the construction supply bok.

displayName.english: Enhance my weapons? I like where this is going.

description.english: Azirad thinks he can enhance any of my energy weapons.
Azirad has created a new boat light.
A large box is loose. Try and stop it for Mogad.
I caught that food thief but I didn't catch his name, I think I'll let him slip on this one.

displayName.english: And what if I like fights? Why should I interrupt them?

description.english: Zot says Zoss and Heza's fight is disturbing other Talan.

displayName.english: Well, I'll have to do something about that.

description.english: There are too many soldiers in Okriana for Zot to agree to stop paying taxes.

displayName.english: Singing? I can't sing! And I don't want to!

description.english: I met a beggar near the well who wants me to sing some mining song with him.

displayName.english: Let's go to the Darothing then!

description.english: Kroax is at the Darosham.
Farmers say something has happened in Ranzaar.

displayName.english: I always knew I'd become a miner someday...

description.english: A worker at a temple wants the Yods to clear debris with some dynamite.
Marion is trapped in a place that's got a large pyramid.

displayName.english: Ah come on, can't she just defend herself?

description.english: Marion is in trouble... again.

displayName.english: I'm the only one capable here.

description.english: Jan and some other Guardians have been captured and taken to the Darosham in Okasankaar.
The Guardian camp is under attack.

displayName.english: I really want this to be over!

description.english: Free the Guardians that were taken to Okaar.
Keep the soldiers busy so Marion can sneak the others out.  Meet her outside when all soldiers are gone.
Take out the soldiers first, then finish Kroax.
Goto Zorkatraz.
Free Martigar trapped in Zorkatraz.
Give the gorgor tooth to Martigar.
Find out the secret stash of treasure in the water.
Kill the Gorgor and get the Mon.

displayName.english: This old hermit might be useful!

description.english: Find out Oru to lead you to Gorgor Island.
Complete 100% of the main quests.
Complete 100% of the secondary quests.
Complete the main quests of Shamazaar.
Complete the main quests of Okansankaar.
Complete the main quests of Motazaar.
Complete the main quests of Talanzaar.
Complete the main quests of Okaar.
Complete the main quests of Ranzaar.
Complete 100% of the subquests of Talanzaar.
Get all the weapons.
Collect 2500 zorkins.
Collect 15.000 zorkins.

displayName.english: Do what you love and the money will follow.

description.english: Collect 30.000 zorkins.
Kill 25 soldiers.
Kill 75 Soldiers
Kill 150 Soldiers
Kill 250 Soldiers
Kill 10 Krakits.
Kill 25 Krakits.
Kill 75 Krakits.
Kill 10 civilians (watch out your reputaion)
Kill over 25 civilians (watch out your reputation!)
Talk to 25 important talans
Kill 3 Twon-Ha (don't do this near Zalinass...).
Give 20 hoti to your Twon-Ha
Find and trade with every merchants.
Get healed 5 times by a Shamaz!
Get the maximum HK-P12's upgrade level.
Get the maximum UZA-SH1's upgrade level.
Get the maximum HAWK-MK8's upgrade level.
Get the maximum LN-DUO 500's upgrade level.
Get the maximum FT 74-X's upgrade level.
Get the highest reputation!
Get the lowest possible reputation!
Kill 10 Soldiers while riding a Twon-Ha.
Talk to 45 Adelpha's unique VIP.
Initiate 250 conversations with Talans.
Create an explosive blast chain reaction with exactly 5 dynamites!
Create an explosive blast chain reaction with 10 or more dynamites.
Let recreators make ammo for each one of your weapons.
Get rewarded 20 times for your side quests.
Locate 20 unique Talans by asking citizens.
Use EVD and lock target on Nikaa over 20 secondes.
In Talanzaar, use EVD XRay mode over 1 minute to observe Talan's life cycles.
Lock EVD on a Soldier  during over 15 secondes!
Use PPS (Invisibility) to drop a dynamite near Soldiers and make it explode!
In Talanzaar, evade Soldier patrols 3 times just by hiding, without using your weapons.
Shoot 30 times in a row using HK-P12 without missing any target (while aiming Soldiers only).
Reach 150 times your targets using UZA-SH1 (Tracer gun)

displayName.english: Like a fish in the water!

description.english: Swim over 5 kilometers!
Ride your Twon-Ha over 10 kilometers!
Run over 20 kilometers!
Travel 10 times through Daokas.
Kill 10 gamors!
Collect 250 Metals.
Collect 100 Shells.
Collect 100 Medikit!
Fill your backpack with 50 dynamites!
Collect 100 Red Helidiums.
Get over 300 ammo for your HK-P12!
Fill your backpack with over 250 ammo for your UZA-SH1
Kill 10 soldiers by using dynamites!

displayName.english: Not sure to be there for that!

description.english: Tell Oru that he owes Kyuran a bottle of lampe.
Tutorial: Succeed Jan's sneaking test.
Tutorial: : Swim down and get the rewards in the water.
Tutorial: : Jump across to the other side of the platform at the top of the steps and get the reward.
Tutorial: Shoot all the vases in Ranzaar!
The barrier to the nord of Shamazaar is now down!
Destroy Egar crate to get Zorkins!
Carve the helidium for the boat light!
Drunk the soldiers with transformed lampe!
Break Tezu's pots to get zorkins!
Buy lampe to Zoss!
Sell some Zort to Zele!
Tell Illot that Naarn is dead!
Destroy Cyana's Soldier Company!
Catch Ylia who stole some zorkins to Zafar!
Kill Soldier's company near the Darosham!
Unlock the wheel to enter into the Darosham!
Find and kill Okaar's Gamors!
Kill the beast on the water behind the tempe Ka
Destroy the 4 boats in Shamazaar to weaken Soldiers!
